notes: This file is a tuning ledger for Balance/BE iterations. 'from' reflects the current baseline; 'to' should be updated per tuning iteration (keep changes minimal when possible).

knobs.name: court_start_headcount

from.notes: v0.2.5 realism lock: steward-only default to avoid early food spiral.

knobs.rationale: Adjust only if early spiral starts persist or 30T completion remains low; prefer tuning consumption/mortality first.

knobs.name: starting_labor_allocation

from.notes: v0.2.5 realism lock: start nearer food-stable by allocating more farmers; idle still consumes.

knobs.rationale: Tune to reduce early shortages without removing meaningful construction tradeoffs.

knobs.name: unrest_shortage_penalty
knobs.rationale: If arrears/shortage spirals dominate, adjust in small increments.

knobs.name: unrest_arrears_penalty
knobs.rationale: Secondary spiral knob; keep low to preserve obligations pressure without guaranteed dispossession.

knobs.name: unrest_baseline_decay_when_stable
knobs.rationale: Keeps Stable Finish meaningful across 30T; tune if unrest tails remain high in prudent runs.

knobs.name: fertility_and_births
knobs.rationale: Primary durability knob for DeathNoHeir rate at 30 turns; keep changes minimal and deterministic.

knobs.name: mortality_age_bands
knobs.rationale: Tune to reduce DeathNoHeir (esp. 65+) while keeping mortality threatening.

knobs.name: market_price_bounds
knobs.rationale: Tune only if coin availability causes systematic collapse across policies/horizons.

knobs.name: prospects_visibility_thresholds

from.notes: Presentation-only thresholds are allowed if prospect spam or irrelevant offers contribute to runaway behavior. No new systems.

knobs.rationale: Only adjust if empirically tied to 30T durability collapse.
